isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 MODEL - CUMMINS ISM ENGINE - OPERATION

svcproc.title: ECM CONNECTIONS
svcproc.para: Refer to circuit diagram CUMMINS ISM - ENGINE CONTROLS in CTS-5254W.
The ECM is connected to the International electrical system at two points:

step1.para: International engine harness 50-way ECM connector (955) connects to ECM port C-1. This connector links several International sensors, switched power, unswitched power ground, switches, diagnostic connector to the ECM and the 1939 data link. The J1939 data link will interface with the transmission and ABS as required.

International 31-way connector (957) connects to the Cummins sensor harness. This connector links the vehicle speed sensor, low coolant switch, air conditioner power switch and engine fan controls to the ECM.
